revised_title: Improvements in Dipping Needles for Measuring Terrestrial Magnetic Force
tldr: The author discusses improvements in instruments and methods used to determine the direction and intensity of the terrestrial magnetic force. They propose a new design for dipping needles that eliminates the need to invert the poles, making observations more accurate and efficient. This design also allows for measuring the terrestrial magnetic intensity alongside the dip, providing valuable information for various scientific expeditions.
